short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Donate to the Amazon Labor Union when you shop on Amazon.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Donate a percent of your order total to the Amazon Labor Union when you shop on Amazon.com. A checkbox is placed on the Amazon checkout page so it is always optional. Please see the homepage for more details.
